channel.title: 317 PK || ChaoticEdgePK
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][U][SIZE=5]ChaoticEdgePk || Almost 24/7! || Fun Pking Server![/SIZE][/U][/B]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4008111/Banner.png[/img]
Website: [url=http://chaoticedgepk.tk/]http://chaoticedgepk.tk/[/url] Forums: [url=http://www.chaoticedgepk.tk/forums/]http://www.chaoticedgepk.tk/forums/[/url] Download Client: [url=http://www.chaoticedgepk.tk/Client.jar]http://www.chaoticedgepk.tk/Client.jar[/url]
[SIZE=5]Webclient coming soon!![/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][/SIZE]
[B][U]Why Us?[/U][/B] Well I guess why not!! This is my first ever Client release and built on source! I have merely worked on this source for quite some time now and I will be constantly working on it, releasing more In-Game items, Bosses, Rewards and Features! As the title reads 'Almost 24/7', The only downtime the server will have will be due to me working on it and the online status on this page will now currently [B][U]NOT[/U][/B] be updated due to the server being run 24/7!! :gg: I hope you guys like my first ever RSPS!! :P Players will also have a chance to pick from one of the following options if 2 active players are successfully introduced! :) -
[B][U]Rewards[/U][/B][/CENTER]
[ul][*]2M Cash GP, [*]One 99 Skill, [*]If 5 active players are introduced you have the chance to use a following PK Points/Donators item for a day! (Armour sets are considered 'one' item)[/ul]
[CENTER][B][U][COLOR="#FF0000"]Encountered some issues with the client![/COLOR][/U][/B] For people that are receiving the; [QUOTE]Java Virtual Machine Launcher A Java Exception Has Occured[/QUOTE] Error upon opening the client.jar, Please upgrade both your java and JDK to the latest version! This will fix any issues you experience! See requirements below if
you experience a problem.
[U]Requirements[/U]
1) Latest version of java; 2) JDK 1.8.0
(a) [U][B]Staff List[/B][/U] (a)
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zit94w.png[/img] [B]Owner[/B] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zit94w.png[/img] Torkz
[IMG]http://i.vanquishrsps.com/dc.png[/img] [B]Coders/Developers[/B] [IMG]http://i.vanquishrsps.com/dc.png[/img] Kinglykrab Op
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=chaoticedgepk.no-ip.org][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/chaoticedgepk.no-ip.org.png[/img][/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UUswiIV.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002117/Screenshot_8.png[/img]
Below you will find a range of images!
[SPOIL][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002126/Claws_Spec.gif[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002127/Screenshot_7__2_.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002130/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002129/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002201/LowLvlTrain.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002202/kdb.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4003570/Maul.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4003569/Rapier_hit.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4007198/Screenshot_3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007199/Screenshot_4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007200/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007204/Screenshot_5.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007205/Screenshot_6.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007206/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4011150/Screenshot_4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4011146/Screenshot_1.png[/img]
Barrows is getting updated to work like real barrows! *Dig, Kill, Score points and open the chest!!*
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4011148/Screenshot_2.png[/img]
[B]Updated quest tab coded by -Kinglykrab[/B]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4010427/Screenshot_7.png[/img] [/SPOIL]
[SIZE=5]Download Link.[/SIZE] (Updated as of Monday 15th April 2014) :gg:
[B][U]V1.2 Client!![/U][/B]
Download Link: [url=http://uppit.com/zmrgnxbd7ws9/Chaotics_Client_V1.2.jar]Chaotics Client V1.2[/url] [/CENTER]

item.title: 317 PK || ChaoticEdgePK
item.dc:creator: @zeejr_xo zeejr_xo
item.description:
@zeejr_xo wrote:

[CENTER][B][U][SIZE=5]ChaoticEdgePk || Almost 24/7! || Fun Pking Server![/SIZE][/U][/B]

Website: http://chaoticedgepk.tk/
Forums: http://www.chaoticedgepk.tk/forums/
Download Client: http://www.chaoticedgepk.tk/Client.jar

[SIZE=5]Webclient coming soon!![/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][/SIZE]

[B][U]Why Us?[/U][/B]
Well I guess why not!! This is my first ever Client release and built on source! I have merely worked on this source for quite some time now and I will be constantly working on it, releasing more In-Game items, Bosses, Rewards and Features! As the title reads ‘Almost 24/7’, The only downtime the server will have will be due to me working on it and the online status on this page will now currently [B][U]NOT[/U][/B] be updated due to the server being run 24/7!! :gg: I hope you guys like my first ever RSPS!! Players will also have a chance to pick from one of the following options if 2 active players are successfully introduced! -

[B][U]Rewards[/U][/B][/CENTER]

[ul][]2M Cash GP,
[]One 99 Skill,
[*]If 5 active players are introduced you have the chance to use a following PK Points/Donators item for a day! (Armour sets are considered ‘one’ item)[/ul]

[CENTER][B][U][COLOR="#FF0000"]Encountered some issues with the client![/COLOR][/U][/B]
For people that are receiving the;

[QUOTE]Java Virtual Machine Launcher
A Java Exception Has Occured[/QUOTE]
Error upon opening the client.jar, Please upgrade both your java and JDK to the latest version! This will fix any issues you experience! See requirements below if

you experience a problem.

[U]Requirements[/U]

  1. Latest version of java;
  2. JDK 1.8.0

(a) [U][B]Staff List[/B][/U] (a)

[B]Owner[/B]
Torkz

[B]Coders/Developers[/B]
Kinglykrab
Op


Below you will find a range of images!

Barrows is getting updated to work like real barrows! Dig, Kill, Score points and open the chest!!

[/SPOIL]
